document.full_text: roger federer ended novak djokovic's 41-match winning streak with a 7-6 6-3 3-6 7-6 victory on friday to set up a french open final meeting with old rival rafa nadal. serbian second seed djokovic went off the rails as the third-seeded federer raised his game to new heights to reach his fifth final at roland garros, and his first grand-slam final since last year's australian open.
document.title: federer stops djokovic to reach paris final
lines_and_colors: roger federer ended novak djokovic's 41-match winning streak with a 7-6 6-3 3-6 7-6 victory on friday to set up a french open final meeting with old rival rafa nadal. serbian second seed djokovic went off the rails as the third-seeded federer raised his game to new heights to reach his fifth final at roland garros, and his first grand-slam final since last year's australian open.
